Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Class MarkdownHelper

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.common.MarkdownHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnnotationSource
public class MarkdownHelper extends Object
Helper class to generate HTML from markdown. Use INSTANCE for default behavior and subclass to customize.
Author:
Pavel
